name: victorian-jewish-writers-project-data
title: Victorian Jewish Writers Project Data
description: Metadata and data derived from Victorian Jewish Writers Project. Welcome to the Victorian Jewish Writers Project, a digital collection focusing on Anglo-Jewish writing during the long nineteenth century. The site is a work-in-progress, so please contact katzir [at] vjwp [dot] org if you need one-on-one assistance.
